snippet.title: Stack Island trailer
snippet.description:
Stack Island is a card-based survival game.
The Early Access version will be released on Steam on June 16, 2023.
It's about getting out of a crisis by combining things you can get around you.

The early access version has a total of 3 stages, and I plan to add contents during the early access period of about 6 months until the full version is released.

Steam store : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2322420
Itch.io : https://interestick.itch.io/cs

thank you
